definition.text: You may think of a workspace as a stage in a theatre. It is the setting on which something will play out!

paragraphs.text: You may set up as many workspaces as you like, each of them for specific use cases. For example, you may have a workspace to build a Trading Sytem that will need specific indicators from a specific Data Mine. Then you may have another workspace setup with all the available indicators so that you may study how each of them work.
Let's get you up to speed with the basics... Read this page so that we may do some playing!
